alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 3:06PM AKST until January 01 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM FRIDAY TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Yakutat Area. * WHEN...From 3 AM Friday to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Friday afternoon and evening. Some mixing with rain is possible Friday night.
info.instruction: A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
